Verses: 1 ungal Sagodhararaippaarththu Ammee Endrum, Ungal Sagodharigalaip Paarththu Rugaamaa Endrum Sollungal.

2 ungal Thaayode Vazhakkaadungal; Aval Enakku Manaiviyumalla, Naan Avalukkup Purushanumalla; Aval Than Vesiththanangalaith Than Mugaththinindrum Than Vyaabaarangalaith Than Sthanangalin Naduvinindrum Vilakkippodakkadaval.

3 illaavittaal Naan Avalai Nirvaanamaaga Urindhu, Aval Pirandhanaalil Irundhavannamaaga Avalai Niruththi, Avalai Andharaveliyaippolaakki, Avalai Varandaboomiyaippol Vittu, Avalaith Thaagaththaal Saagappannuven;
4 avaludaiya Pillaigal Sorappillaigalaagaiyaal Avargalukku Irangaadhiruppen.

5 avargaludaiya Thaai Soramponaal, Avargalai Garppandhariththaval Lachchaiyaana Kaariyangalai Seydhaal; Appaththaiyum, Thanneeraiyum, Aattumayiraiyum, Panjaiyum, Enneyaiyum, Paanangalaiyum Koduththuvarugira Ennesargalaip Pinpatrippoven Endraal.
6 aagaiyaal, Idho, Naan Unvazhiyai Mullugalinaal Adaippen; Aval Than Paadhaigalaik Kandupidikkak Koodaadhapadikku Madhilai Ezhuppuven.

7 aval Than Nesargalaip Pinthodarndhum Avargalai Seruvadhillai, Avargalaith Thediyum Kandupidippadhillai; Appozhudhu Aval Naan En Mundhina Purushanidaththukkuth Thirumbippoven; Ippozhudhu Irukkiradhaippaarkkilum Appozhudhu Enakku Nanmaiyaayirundhadhu Enbaal.

8 thanakku Naan Dhaaniyaththaiyum Dhraatcharasaththaiyum Enneyaiyum Koduththavarendrum, Thanakku Naan Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Perugappanninavarendrum Aval Ariyaamarponaal; Avaigalai Avargal Paagaaludaiyadhaakkinaargal.

9 aadhalaal Naan En Dhaaniyaththai Adhin Kaalaththilum, En Dhraatcharasaththai Adhin Kaalaththilum Thirumba Eduththukkondu, Avaludaiya Nirvaanaththai Moodugiradharku Naan Koduththirundha Aattumayiraiyum Sanalaiyum Thirumbap Pidungikkolluven.
10 ippodhum Avaludaiya Nesargalin Kangalukku Munbaaga Avaludaiya Avalatchanaththai Velippaduththuven; Oruvarum Avalai Enkaikku Neengalaakki Viduvippadhillai.

11 avaludaiya Ellaa Magizhchchiyaiyum, Avaludaiya Pandigaigalaiyum, Avaludaiya Maadhappirappugalaiyum, Avaludaiya Oivunaatkalaiyum, Sabaikoodugira Avargaludaiya Ellaa Aasarippugalaiyum Ozhiyappannuven.

12 en Nesargal Enakkuk Koduththa Panaiyam Endru Aval Sonna Avaludaiya Dhraatchachchedigalaiyum, Avaludaiya Aththimarangalaiyum Naan Paazhaakki, Avaigalaik Kaadaaippogappannuven; Kaattumirugangal Avaigalaith Thinnum.

13 aval Paagaalgalukkuth Thoobankaatti, Than Netrippattangalinaalum Than Aabaranangalinaalum Thannai Singaariththukkondu, Than Nesaraip Pinthodarndhu, Ennai Marandhupona Naatkalinimiththam Avalai Visaarippenendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
14 aayinum, Idho, Naan Avalukku Nayankaatti, Avalai Vanaandharaththil Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avalode Patchamaaip Pesi,

15 avvidaththilirundhu Avalukku Avaludaiya Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum, Nambikkaiyin Vaasalaaga Aagorin Pallaththaakkaiyum Koduppen; Appozhudhu Aval Ange, Than Ilavayadhin Naatkalilum Thaan Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Vandha Naalilum Paadinadhupol Paaduvaal.
16 akkaalaththil Nee Ennai Ini Paagaali Endru Sollaamal, Eeshi Endru Solluvaai Endru Karththar Uraikkiraar.
17 paagaalgaludaiya Naamangalai Aval Vaayilirundhu Atruppogappannuven; Ini Avaigalin Peraichcholli, Avaigalai Ninaikkira Ninaippum Illaamarpogum.

18 akkaalaththil Naan Avargalukkaagak Kaattumirugangalodum, Aagaayaththup Paravaigalodum, Boomiyile Oorum Praanigalodum, Oru Udanpadikkaipanni, Villaiyum Pattayaththaiyum Yuththaththaiyum Dhesaththile Iraadhapadikku Muriththu, Avargalai Sugamaaip Paduththukkondirukkappannuven.
19 niththiya Vivaagaththukkendru Unnai Enakku Niyamiththukkolluven; Needhiyum Nyaayamum Kirubaiyum Urukka Irakkamumaai Unnai Enakku Niyamiththukkolluven.
20 unmaiyaai Unnai Enakku Niyamiththukkolluven; Nee Karththarai Arindhukolluvaai.
21 akkaalaththil Naan Marumozhikoduppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Naan Vaanangalukku Marumozhikoduppen, Avaigal Boomikku Marumozhi Kodukkum.
22 boomi Dhaaniyaththukkum Dhraatcharasaththukkum Enneykkum Marumozhi Kodukkum, Ivaigal Yesrayelukkum Marumozhi Kodukkum.
23 naan Avalai Enakkendru Boomiyile Vidhaiththu, Irakkam Peraadhirundhavalukku Iranguven; En Janamallaadhirundhavargalai Nokki Nee En Janamendru Solluven; Avargal En Dhevane Enbaargal Endraar.
